item.description:
This restaurant services traditional Portuguese "peasant" food. Their specialty is grilled chicken cooked over an open flame.

They serve large portions at a very reasonable price. Parking might be a challenge, because although they have a small lot in the back, it's usually full. Street parking is also available.

Most of us will be coming from the rock climbing event, but please feel free to join us just for dinner.

I've set the RSVP deadline to March 6th, so that I can reserve a table for us.

I hope to see you all there.
item.how_to_find_us: It's a very small place, you won't be able to miss us.
item.name: Portuguese Grill
